strategy: Black Legion armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All Black Legion Core, Elite and Support formations, as well as all Traitor Titan formations, have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Black Legion, using their preferred operational methods.

formations.name: Black Legion Retinue
formations.units: Eight Chaos Space Marines, one Chaos Lord or Sorcerer Lord

sections.name: Black Legion Elite Formations
sections.description: One Elite formation may be fielded per Core formation

formations.name: Chaos Terminators
formations.units: Four Chaos Terminators, one Chaos Lord or Sorcerer Lord

sections.name: Black Legion Support Formations
sections.description: Two Support formations may be fielded per Core formation

formations.name: Bike Company
formations.units: Eight Chaos Space Marine Assault Bikes, one Chaos Lord or Sorcerer Lord

formations.name: Raptor Cult
formations.units: Six Raptors, one Chaos Lord or Sorcerer Lord

formations.name: Havocs
formations.units: Four Havocs, one Chaos Lord or Sorcerer Lord, two Rhinos

sections.name: Dark Mechanicus Daemon Engines, Traitor Titans and Chaos Navy
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Defiler Pack
upgrades: Add up to two Defilers for 50 points each

formations.name: Chaos Warhound
upgrades: Add one Chaos Warhound for 225 Points

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Greater Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Greater Daemon Pool points

upgrades.title: Black Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Battleship
items.description: Replace the Devastation Class Cruiser with a Despoiler Class Battleship

options.description: Replace the Chaos Lord with a Warlord
Replace the Chaos Lord and its unit with a Daemon Prince of Chaos Undivided
Add up to four Chaos Rhinos (Retinue only)
Add up to four Chaos Land Raiders
(No more than needed to transport the formation with no space left over)

items.name: Daemonic Pact
items.description: Add Daemonic Pact to the formation, and one point to the Lesser Daemon Pool

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add two Chaos Dreadnoughts to the formation

items.name: Champion
items.description: Add one Champion of Chaos Undivided character to the formation

items.name: Stalker
items.description: Add one Chaos Stalker to the formation

items.name: Dreadclaws
items.description: Transport a formation containing only infantry units and Dreadnoughts in Dreadclaws (formation must be deployed on a space ship)

items.name: Havocs
items.description: Replace four Chaos Space Marines with four Havocs

options.description: Replace four Chaos Space Marines with four Noise Marines
Replace four Chaos Space Marines with four Plague Marines
Replace four Chaos Space Marines with four Khorne Berzerkers
Replace four Chaos Space Marines with four Rubric Marines

items.name: Obliterators
items.description: Replace up to two Chaos Terminators with Obliterators
